answers.answer: Hi, if you are negative for all you don't need to retest.  If you are worried I guess you could do it again in 6 months but you sound like you are good to go.  I have diabetes, it did not affect my testTake CareDee
In your opinion 6 months negative result is accurate in my case?

question: Hello Everyone,Last may 19, 2015 i had exposure with blood, last november 18 2015, blood drawn and all test are negative Hepatitis B & C , HIVI have a diabetes and i would like to ask if diabetes can affect my hepatitis test,Do i need another test or my 6 month negative test result is enough?
title: 6 Months Hepatitis B & C Result
